suite.name: Uart Tests

test.name: Case1_Button_Transmission

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

test.doc: This test simulates the UART transmission from the microcontroller to the PC when a push button is pressed and released. It ensures that the correct strings ("button_pressed" and "button_released") are sent through UART.

test.name: Case2_LED_Command_Reception

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.doc: This test verifies that the UART correctly receives and interprets commands from the PC to control the LED. It checks that valid commands like "LED turned ON" and "LED turned OFF" are properly recognized and processed.

test.name: Case3_Invalid_Command

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.doc: This test checks how the system responds to an invalid or corrupted UART command. It ensures that any unrecognized command results in an appropriate error message instead of causing unexpected behavior or crashes.

test.name: Case4_Baud_Rate_Check

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

test.doc: This test validates that the UART module is configured with the correct communication baud rate (9600 bps), which ensures proper synchronization between the microcontroller and the PC.

test.name: Case5_Continuous_Transmission

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

test.doc: This test simulates a sequence of multiple UART transmissions occurring back-to-back without delay. It ensures that each transmitted message is valid and that no data is lost or interrupted during continuous operation.

suite.doc: UART Automated Test Suite This suite validates UART communication between a PC and an ATmega328P (via Arduino Uno). It ensures correct data transmission and reception over the UART interface, as well as handling of invalid commands and continuous operation.
